text: Carmen Joan Duncan (7 July 1942 â€“ 3 February 2019) was an Australian actress and activist. She was nominated for the AFI Award for Best Actress for the 1980 movie Harlequin. She was also known for the movie Don't Let It Get You. Her other movie appearances include Touch and Go (1980) and Turkey Shoot (1982). She played Iris Wheeler on the American soap opera Another World from 1988 to 1994. Duncan died on 3 February 2019 from cancer in Sydney, aged 76. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Sydney Category:Australian movie actors Category:Australian television actors Category:Actors from New South Wales
title: Carmen Duncan
